name: ESP_MultiResetDetector
keywords: rtc, eeprom, littlefs, spiffs, reset, data, esp32, esp32-c3, esp32-s2, esp32-s3, esp8266, double-reset, multi-reset, detector, DoubleResetDetector, double-reset-detector, multi-reset-detector, esp-wifimanager, espasync-wifimanager
description: Library to detect multiple resets within a predetermined time, using RTC or RAM Memory for ESP8266 and ESP32, ESP32_C3, ESP32_S2, ESP32_S3. An alternative start-up mode can be used. One example use is to allow re-configuration of device WiFi credentials. Replaces DoubleResetDetector.
